skillTree.localised_description: And then the Cataclysm came. King Taal rose from His Forest, and with Dark Morr muttering dire portents in His ear, He banished all immortals from the world.
The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: The Drakwald Forest is vast and treacherous, and many monstrosities such as Beastmen, Orcs and Minotaurs make their lairs deep within it. These creatures are dangerous and savage, and must be purged from time to time lest their numbers grow out of control. Finding these lairs is difficult, and so the Middenlanders use packs of Hunting Hounds to sniff them out and hunt them down. These packs are often led by Hunt Masters, who guide them towards the foe.

effects.description:
Bonus vs. Large: +10 for Imperial Hunting hounds
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: A lifetime spent hunting in the Imperial forests primes one to face a different kind of prey across the battlefield.

effects.description:
Range: +12% for Huntsmen and Archers
	(all units in army)

Bonus vs Large ammo for Huntsmen and Archers units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: Knowing which leaves, roots, berries and mushrooms can be safely eaten, and which will kill you stone dead, is a distinct advantage on campaign.
These arrows will kill of course, but are mainly used to cause a disorientating, explosive spectacle to unnerve the enemy.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: Silent, swift and very, very deadly, this one can take down the foe from range without breaking a sweat or revealing his position.
Through the skin to kill the soul.
Only the foolish go on the hunt without supplies and a cast-iron plan.
Such advanced ballistic skills tend to rub off on one's subordinates.
The more, the deadlier, the merrier.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
It may be cruel, but the power to burn the foe to ash is extremely useful when you want to be sure of winning.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
As they careen and stagger about, their flesh irreparably charred beyond recognition, perhaps the foe will rue the day they made war on the Empire?
"I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.description: Vanguard Deployment||This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target
Applies +50% Flame Weakness and -48% Speed on contact
Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A regal air? Let's see how long that lasts.
"The smallfolk should be thankful - without us, who would they work for?"

effects.description:
Construction time: -25% for all buildings
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Franz has put his trust in this man; pray he does not let him down!
"If it's got a scent and footprints, I'll find it. Also, it helps if it's absolutely huge and can be spotted a league away."
The thrill of the chase, the tremor as the quarry is cornered, the ecstasy of the kill. These are the things that matter.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
